body.name: Sanitaire PROFESSIONAL TRADITION® Upright Vacuum,Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 23 hrs 20 mins
features: Commercial-rated, light-duty machines designed to provide the clean you need. Simplified. Streamlined. Built for your business — and your budget.
Motor life provides more than 500 hours of commercial-grade cleaning performance.
Large-capacity disposable bag holds up to 11 quarts of dirt and debris for less interruption while cleaning.
Unique maintenance features, like the tool-free brush roll and belt replacement and metal clip bag release system, make this commercial vacuum easy-to-use and easy-to-maintain.
Weighs only 15 lbs., so it’s easy-to-transport and comfortable to use.
body.description: Get the “just right” clean for your business—and your budget—with the Sanitaire PROFESSIONAL Upright Vacuum. This commercial-rated, light-duty machine is designed especially for your needs. Simplified and streamlined to fit your business, it’s the affordable option that works as hard as you do.

reviews.reviewText: I have a professional house cleaning company, I have used these vacuums for years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum only comes with a 25 ft cord other Sanitaire products I bought are 50 ft. Also this is first Sanitaire I bought that has a filtration bag inside regular vacuum bag. It gets screwed into the base & is not compatible with the hook & latch on dump bags that we use. Doesn't sound super powerful but will put in small account.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It just work for 2 days and then out of nothing stop working just didn’t turn on 🙄 we check everything and nothing was burn 😒 so now i can’t return it because i trew the box were it came 😞

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST Vacuum Cleaner I've EVER Owned
reviews.reviewText: Over the years, I've been through multiple different cheaper and lower quality vacuum cleaners from the big box store. Bissell, Eureka, Dyson, Shark. With three cats and a decent amount of foot traffic through my mostly carpeted home, these above listed machines constantly clogged and had would stink if you didn't wash the washable/reusable HEPA filter, plus the dirt cups were gross to empty. I wanted to switch back to the classic bagged vacuum I remembered my grandma having. This machine outperforms all of the above listed brands I've tried over the years. Although, previously owned by Eureka/Electrolux and now owned by Bissell, Sanitaire is still in its own class, as far as quality goes. This machine is super quiet to use, and I like that the sound isn't an awful high pitch screaming noise. It has a very soft sound. It has very powerful suction power, and the allergen filtration is awesome. No odor while vacuuming, because the bags filter so well. Very lightweight, and it agitates and grooms the carpet great. Leaves nice lines. Carpet height adjustment dial is very user friendly and easy to turn. Bag changes are super simple. I also like that if, in the RARE event it jams/clogs or you need to replace the belt, no tools are necessary to take it apart. Everything snaps apart and snaps back together without tools. All around awesome vacuum. 10 out of 5 stars!!!
